mapper.sql: SELECT pBoard_no, title, content, pboard_date, status, menu_no, member_no FROM page_board
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO page_board (pboard_no, title, content, menu_no, member_no) VALUES (page_board_sequence.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{menuNo}, #{memberNo})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum idx, s.* FROM ( SELECT pBoard_no, title, content, pboard_date, status, menu_no, member_no FROM page_board WHERE menu_no = #{menuno} AND status = '1' ) s ) WHERE idx >= #{start} AND idx < #{last}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum idx, s.* FROM ( SELECT pBoard_no, title, content, pboard_date, status, menu_no, member_no FROM page_board WHERE menu_no = #{menuno} AND status = '5') s ) WHERE idx >= #{start} AND idx < #{last}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum idx, s.* FROM ( SELECT pBoard_no, title, content, pboard_date, status, menu_no, member_no FROM page_board WHERE menu_no = #{menuno} ) s ) WHERE idx >= #{start} AND idx < #{last} AND title like '%' || #{search} || '%' AND status = '1'
